title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for interacting with the Ollama server.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript library for Ollama.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as LLM or embeddings in LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich, self-hosted web interface for Ollama supporting chat, model management, RAG, and multi-user workspaces.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client library for Ollama with sync/async APIs and Spring Boot starter.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Community-maintained Ruby gem for Ollama.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based CLI wrapper around Ollama with prompt templates and history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that brings local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot chat.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension to chat with local Ollama models inside the editor.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama in Kubernetes with GPU support and horizontal scaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & CUDA) for running Ollama server in containers.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Simple RAG example using Ollama embeddings + Chroma vector store and Llama 3.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that lets users chat with local Ollama models in any Discord server.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app to interact with Ollama models via Slack threads and slash commands.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin to summarize notes, generate flashcards, and Q&A using local Ollama models.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript/TypeScript client.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client.

title: ollama-reddit
summary: Active subreddit for discussing Ollama models, tips, and ecosystem projects.
